titles.title: Commending the Governments of India and Pakistan for improved diplomatic relations between the two countries, and for other purposes.
Commending the Governments of India and Pakistan for improved diplomatic relations between the two countries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Commends the Governments of India and Pakistan for improved diplomatic relations between the two countries and applauds them for their efforts to improve relations and reduce tensions. Calls on both Governments to continue working together to solve mutual problems and view each other as regional partners.
